name: Millwood Inn & Suites

reviews.text: Overall experience was good. The hotel staff was friendly and tried their best to accommodate us. I was there on business in the area and they have included wireless or port access in the rooms. The business center consists of a computer and printer on a lobby desk. The room was comfortable with flat screen TV and VCR, refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker. There was a phone in the bathroom.
reviews.title: Positive Stay at Millwood

likes.disliked: — Busy street and having to make U-turn to enter the parking lot if going north bound.

reviews.text: The included breakfast was a deluxe continental breakfast and was well stocked and with variety, included microwavable breakfast burritos and waffle maker. Coffee machine gave you of variety of coffee choices including expresso, latte, and flavored coffee.
reviews.title: Good value, above average motel

reviews.text: Located on a busy street with some construction next door. Many rooms located on street level with the center wing two stories. Many nearby restaurants to choose from. Close to SF airport.
reviews.title: good if you park and fly
Good Valus
reviews.text: I stayed at the Millwood Inn two times in September for four nights altogether. The location is especially convenient for San Francisco airport, and the BART connection from/to Millbrae offers an option to get to downtown San Francisco without having to worry about traffic and finding some parking space. You also get pretty quick to the Golden Gate area and beaches by car. Shopping (from supermarket to mall) and dining is available in the area along Camino Real.

reviews.title: What a find
reviews.text: The rooms offer all you might need, from coffee maker, hair dryer, fridge and microwave to flat screen TV with video and DVD player. The room was rather large (but I was travelling alone), beds are really comfortable. There's also a laundry room (washer/dryer are cheaper than those of the common motel chains) and a fitness room (which I didn't find time to use). Free internet connection (in case you don't have a laptop, there's a computer available in the lobby). Breakfast offers a good selection from fruits to preparing fresh waffles - better than the usual 'continental breakfast'.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed there the first two nights of our two-week PCH trip this fall and then the last night. The hotel is great, the room very comfortable, the staff very helpful and competent, the location is fantastic - just 10 minutes from SFO, and the continental breakfast is great - a wide variety of choices.
reviews.title: Millwood Inn A little Gem

likes.liked: — location and price and continental breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As we were coming close to the end of our stay it was nice to know that we were reserved in a great hotel for the last night.
reviews.title: very nice

likes.liked: — clean rooms, free internet, breakfast was good
likes.disliked: — could have used another washer & dryer, few more parking spots

reviews.title: Great place - close to the airport!

reviews.text: Booked this place based on previous reviews. As it was Memorial Weekend, they were nearly full, and only had a smoking room available for the first night. However, bearing in mind how much I dislike smoking, it wasn't too bad, which suggests the cleaning is thorough. They moved me for the next 2 nights to a non-smoking room.
reviews.title: Great quality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms aren't the biggest I've been in, but they are definitely the highest quality motel rooms I've had in 5 weeks of motel travel. Great bedding with 4 quality pillows, the bathroom is how you'd like your own to look after a professional refit, and the little touches like glassware for coffee cups and water, big flat sceen tv, high quality soap and stuff for the ladies: really comprehensive free breakfast offering including (cold) boiled eggs, bacon strips and cheese slices, fruit, waffle maker... it's just a cut above all the other motels I've stayed in. Good wifi, and very helpful front desk who allowed me a late checkout to match flight time.
reviews.title: great value airport hotel

reviews.text: I'll certainly stay here again if I'm in the area - it's just a pity this isn't a national chain!
reviews.title: Favorite inn so far

reviews.text: We stayed here at the beginning and end of our holiday. The hotel is about a mile from SFO international airport and has a free shuttle. The staff were friendly and helpful and our room was very clean and well maintained. The free complimentary breakfast was very good.
reviews.title: Adored the Millwood!!!

likes.disliked: — not one thing i can think of

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We walked to the BART and caught the train into downtown without any problems - (it is about a mile walk). The hotel is in a good neighbourhood with lots of small cheapish restaurants around.
reviews.title: Good value and location

likes.liked: — The array of choices for breakfast, friendly staff

description: The Millwood Inn & Suites welcomes business and leisure travelers to enjoy a tradition of warm, personal hospitality. Located south of San Francisco in Millbrae, California, this distinctive hotel offers a refreshing mix of lifestyle luxuries and a relaxed coastal vibe for working, relaxing, playing and exploring the San Francisco Bay Area. Enjoy a casual contemporary ambiance that makes you feel at home. Our hotel offers a comfortable eco-friendly hotel experience in Millbrae, California.Our amenities include a flat panel TV with over 100 satellite channels, HDTV, WiFi, DVD player, alarm-clock radio, microwave, refrigerator, drip coffee/tea maker, hair dryer, full-size iron and ironing board, well-lit vanity and luxurious bath products. We also have a fitness center, breakfast buffet, an interactive business space, gift shop, parking for overnight guests and shuttle to the airport.
